{"title": "Hellfire - Exciting Helicopter Combat", "title_search": "hellfire  exciting helicopter combat", "title_keyword": "hellfire  exciting helicopter combat", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/hellfire-exciting-helicopter-combat/", "summary": "Hellfire is an exciting helicopter combat game that takes you on a worldwide tour of duty. {"title": "Magnetic Joe (2009)", "title_search": "magnetic joe 2009", "title_keyword": "magnetic joe 2009", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/magnetic-joe-2009/", "summary": "Magnetic Joe is an arcade game with a revolutionarily simple control method. Your goal is to guide Joe, the little magnetic ball, to the exit of the levels by tapping the touch screen at the right moment. Sounds easy, doesn't it? You would not believe what wide range of possibilities and how much fun lies in this simple action.  We could write pages about why Magnetic Joe is innovative, why it is addictive, why it is a "lifestyle" but instead of doing so, we suggest you download the game and check it out yourself.  Magnetic Joe offers you 50 challenging and fun levels, which will soon be followed by additional ones in the form of updates to the game. Completing these 50 levels does not mean game over though either, as you can always try to improve your best time. On top of that, hardcore Joe players can try to beat the developers' best times as well!  Well, gentlemen - start your magnets!
